topic.title: Publiehing a Zite from Android with Mobile Data
topic.body: I am trying to publish a simple zite; I could swear I've done this before, but now it's asking me to open up port 30120. However, I'm on a phone using mobile data, so there are no router settings and there's no firewall of UPNP settings in the phone's settings. Not sure what to do.

1608393223_16F1RWwNC66bZu8h8sJBo2onWJ98D.body: I can't publish it because port 30120 isn't open and I can't open it because there's no router settings to get into.
Dude. There is no site to publish because it hasn't been uploaded yet, and I don't want the site to be public.
No, I stil need help opening the port.
Oh, I'm only just now seeing your other post. I'm not using a VPN. It's a regular mobile data connection.

> [whitegenocide](#comment_48_14Y5YpotfVjQyQfdrW3PFuYDQTfpPAZ4GK): If you have android you can install a firewall and manage the ports yourself...

Get a firewall app, and open up port 30120?

> [whitegenocide](#comment_48_14Y5YpotfVjQyQfdrW3PFuYDQTfpPAZ4GK): If you have android you can install a firewall and manage the ports yourself...

I tried a firewall app but that didn't do anything?
So can no one publish zites on a mobile over mobile data? I mean, I kinda need to fix this.
